about_the_game:
Enjoy all songs exlusively produced for Bauhaus Bonk. We've worked with several artists to ensure a unique listening experience that supports the gameplay.

The OST entails four electro-swing songs to be enjoyed beyond the restrictions of the game. 

This bundle is a way to support us while still getting something in return. We appreciate everyone who's willing to support and enjoys the music!
